Rule.name: intent-network up: trust (responder toward initiator)
Rule.description: The intent of this move is to have the trust network between the responder and the initiator to go up.

Rule.name: The responder must be feeling bad in order for the initiator to want to encourage the responder.

Predicate.name: status(responder, initiator, cat: feeling good about someone, -1)
status(responder, initiator, cat: feeling bad about someone, -1)

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, I've noticed you've been a bit down lately.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? It shows that much?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: A bit. But y'know, you should have more confidence in yourself. You're an amazing person.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow. Coming from you, that means a lot, %i%. Thanks.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, I've noticed you've had a rough time of it lately.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? It shows that much?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: A bit. But you should have more confidence in yourself. You're a great person.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You'll have to forgive me when I say that I don't really believe you right now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Alright... just thought I'd try.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%. You hear that?
It's music. Coming from the ballroom over there. And I'm in a dancing mood.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%, I don't think-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: C'mon! I'll be with you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well... okay. But only because it's you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%, do you hear that music coming from the ballroom?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, it's lovely.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It is. And it puts me in a dancing mood. Would you care to join me?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Umm, yeah, I'd love to, but... I just recently quit dancing.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh. I see.

Rule.name: The responder must have done something mean to the initiator within the last 6 turns.

Predicate.name: status(initiator, responder, cat: feeling bad about someone, -1)
status(initiator, responder, cat: feeling good about someone, -1)

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't just 'hey' me, %r%. I'm still upset with you for what you said earlier.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... okay.
